fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Rig the vote during the day to ignore whoever was supposed to be hanged and hang your own target.
- Evict someone at night. When they refuse, you attack them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your target will always refuse to be evicted, as that's just flavor text.
- If you're investigated, the results for every Town role in the game will be given to your investigator.
- The above attribute will give separate messages. So, a Sheriff checking Town with 7 town roles that exist will get the "Not Suspicious" message 7 times.
- The frames placed on other players don't apply, frames placed on you do. So, a Sheriff checking you while you're Hexed with 7 town will find you to be a member of the Coven 7 times.
- The first time you're attacked, you live and are redirected to your attacker.
- Control, roleblock, and redirect immune. You bypass your own redirect immunity.
